title: The Mysterious Murder
story: Once upon a time, in a small town called Maplewood, a murder took place.
The victim, Mr. Anderson, was found dead in his mansion late one night.
Who could have done such a thing?

suspect.name: Mrs. Jenkins
suspect.alibi: Mrs. Jenkins claims to have been at a charity event during the time of the murder.
suspect.confirmation: However, no one at the event can confirm her presence.

witness.name: Detective Johnson
witness.observation: Detective Johnson observed a suspicious figure leaving the crime scene.
witness.description: The figure was tall, wearing a black coat and a hat that covered their face.

npcs.name: Butler
npcs.dialogue: I have served Mr. Anderson for years and I can't believe he is gone.

npcs.name: Maid
npcs.dialogue: I saw Mrs. Jenkins leaving the mansion that night. She looked anxious.

clues.Front Door: The front door was locked from the inside.
clues.Library Door: The library door was ajar, suggesting someone may have entered or exited through it.
clues.Kitchen Door: The kitchen door was found wide open.
clues.Lobby: There were footprints leading from the lobby to the library.
